name: Eggs?
description:
My first Ludum Dare game jam game! I didn't have a whole lot of time, and I basically made this game in like a few hours just before the deadline, but it still works (atleast kind of :)). All of the art is made by me (big surprise) and the code is also written within the deadline! Please remember that this game is pretty crappy, because I made it with sfml and c++ in which I have very limited experience with, so I didn't have time to add a splash screen, menu or sounds. Thanks! :D

RULES

You're a chicken, and you need to prevent the falling big egg from falling down and breaking. You need to collect the small eggs to keep the big egg in air. You gain points by the time survived.

A and D to move, Space to jump!

Press R to restart the game! (Doesn't always work, sorry :(
